attributes.action: put Tony Blair on trial from crimes against humanity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has lied to the nation to propagate his illegal wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.  Now our troops are home from Iraq it is time to put him on trial for his crimes against humanity.  Starting an aggressive war is a crime against humanity, as established at the Nuremberg trials.  It is the responsibility of the British Government to bring this reprobate to justice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
